page.title: 15CHANGING TIMES
page.content: The biggest change in Mrs.Bream's life is the kind of house she lives in and their possessions.She has lived in Spaldwick all her life and was born in a cottage.She had a happy life as a child with two brothers and six sisters.The cottage had two rooms upstairs and two downstairs.They had a ladder instead of stairs.They cooked on a coal range.On Sunday they took dinner to be cooked at the baker's shop.She went to the old village school.It only had two classes for children between 5 years and 14 years.Mrs.Bream now lives in a modern bungalow.She has no children.She works as a dinner lady at the new village school. She has an electric cooker ,music centre and television.
